mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a small program for the Southwestern Virginia Area Special Projects Committee Pre-Bicentennial Memorial Banquet on Saturday, September 27, 1975. There is a hand-written note on the back which reads, "My Mother, Eliza Walker, was memorialized at this banquet. "Pioneer Civil Rights Worker" particularly in education."
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Eliza Walker Memorialized, September 27, 1975
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Walker, Eliza Bannister
